packages.name: Google Calendar, Task, Reminder, and Gmail Search and Gmail Notification Device
packages.description: Google Calendar, Task, Reminder, and Gmail Search integrates Hubitat Elevation with Google for automations based on items found.  Included Gmail Notification Device provides Gmail email notifications from Hubitat Elevation.

packages.name: Twilio SMS and Voice Notifications
packages.description: Send SMS and initiate voice call notifications via the Plivo.

packages.name: Plivo SMS and Voice Notifications
packages.description: Send SMS and initiate voice call notifications via the Plivo.
